about_the_game:
The Earth's Shadow Demo allows players to experience a small portion of what Earth's Shadow is all about. Sci-fi dungeon crawler where the player will explore a dark planet filled with alien enemies, traps, loot and treasure.

Features


  • All loot is random
  • Every play-through is different
  • Dynamic stats on all equipment
  • Loot categorized as Magic, Rare, Epic and Legendary
  • Traps, puzzles, treasure and much more
  • Interesting characters (Fully Voiced)

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10

  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
